mods.abstract: Temple of Amen and Sacred Lake at Karnak, East Thebes. Sacred lake (foreground) before ruined colonnades, pylon, and obelisks of the Temple of Amen (background); priests would purify themselves in the sacred lake before religious duties at Temple; "Sacred Lake, Karnak 564 Brown 14 1/2 x 9 1/2 on a mount" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
